title: Medication Administration Record Schema
description:
Create Medication Administration Record (MAR) Database Schema

Design and implement a comprehensive database schema for tracking medication administration records in a healthcare system.

Requirements:
- Define a MAR table/model with the following required fields:
  * Administered medication (name, dosage form, strength)
  * Dose administered (quantity and unit of measurement)
  * Administration time (scheduled time vs actual administration time)
  * Route of administration (oral, IV, IM, subcutaneous, etc.)
  * Nurse ID (foreign key to staff/user table)
  * Status (scheduled, administered, missed, refused, held, discontinued)

- Add supporting fields for data integrity:
  * Unique record identifier (primary key)
  * Patient identifier (foreign key to patient table)
  * Medication order reference (link to prescribing order)
  * Timestamps (created_at, updated_at)
  * Administration notes/comments field for special circumstances

- Implement constraints and validation:
  * Ensure required fields are non-nullable
  * Add check constraints for valid status values
  * Validate dose values are positive numbers
  * Set up foreign key relationships with proper referential integrity

- Consider audit requirements:
  * Track who administered the medication and when
  * Preserve historical records (no deletions, only status updates)
  * Include fields for witnessing nurse if required for controlled substances

- Document the schema with:
  * Field descriptions and data types
  * Relationships to other tables (patients, medications, nurses, orders)
  * Indexes for common query patterns (by patient, by nurse, by time range)
